fields.name: Bergamot & Geranium
fields.description: Pamper your skin with our Luxurious Body Butter, a sumptuous blend of the finest natural ingredients designed to deeply nourish, hydrate, and rejuvenate your skin. This blend contains the amazing aroma of Bergamot and Geranium essential oils.

fields.name: Jasmine & Rosemary
fields.description: Indulge your skin with our Luxurious Body Butter, a decadent fusion of premium natural ingredients crafted to intensely moisturise, nourish and revitalise your skin. This opulent body butter is ideal for skincare enthusiasts who crave a lavish experience. This sweet aroma contains Jasmine and Rosemary essential oils.

fields.name: Lime
fields.description: Treat your skin to our exquisite Body Butter, a rich blend of the finest natural ingredients to deeply hydrate, nourish, and rejuvenate your skin. Perfect for skincare aficionados, this indulgent body butter offers unparalleled pampering experience. This body butter comes with the citrusy scent of Lime essential oil.

fields.name: Tee Tree & Peppermint
fields.description: Discover the difference with our nourishing hair butter. Enriched with plenty natural oils this hair butter keeps your hair healthy and vibrant. This hair butter is suitable for all hair types. The minty aroma comes from the scent of Tea Tree and Peppermint essential oils.

fields.name: Ylang Ylang
fields.description: Elevate your haircare regimen with our this hair butter. A carefully curated suite of products formulated to moisturise, fortify and revitalise your tresses. Perfect for those dedicated to attaining luscious, healthy hair, this hair butter harnesses nature's finest ingredients to deliver remarkable results. This hair butter boasts the floral, fruity aroma of Ylang Ylang essential oil.

fields.name: Lavender & Rosemary
fields.description: Enhance your haircare routine with our Luxurious Hair Butter, a meticulously crafted blend designed to deeply nourish, strengthen, rejuvenate your hair. Ideal for those committed to achieving silky, vibrant locks, this hair butter combines premium natural ingredients to provide exceptional care and stunning results. This hair butter contains the harmonious combination of Lavender and Rosemary Essential Oils.

fields.name: Cedarwood & Cinnamon
fields.description: Experience the ultimate in haircare with our nourishing Herbal Shampoo enriched with the goodness of African Black Soap and a blend of revitalising herbs. This unique formula combines the natural cleansing power of African Black Soap with carefully curated selection of herbs known for their beneficial properties. This shampoo contains Cedarwood and Cinnamon essential oils for a naturally sweet scent.

fields.name: Tea Tree & Peppermint 2
fields.description: Transform your haircare routine with our Herbal Shampoo featuring African Black Soap and a blend of enriching herbs. Embrace the benefits of natural ingredients for vibrant, radiant hair that looks and feels its best everyday, A blend of Tea Tree and Peppermint essential oils will give your hair the strong fresh minty scent.

fields.name: Jasmine & Rosemary
fields.description: Embark on a journey of exceptional hair care with our revitalising Herbal Shampoo, infused with the enriching benefits of African Black Soap and a chosen blend of natural herbs. This extraordinary formula harmoniously blends the cleansing prowess of African Black Soap with a selection of potent herbs renowned for their nourishing and revitalising properties. This fine products contains Jasmine and Rosemary essential oils to create a sweet aromatic aura on your scalp.

fields.name: Jasmine Oil
fields.description: Discover the secret to radiant skin and lustrous hair with our Baobab Seed Oil, a luxurious elixir retracted from the seeds of Africa's iconic baobab tree. Its soothing and healing qualities will leave you feeling replenished and nourished. This oil combos with Jasmine essential oil to give it an extra rich aura.

fields.name: Lavender Oil
fields.description: Uncover the essence of natural beauty with our Baobab Seed Oil, a sublime serum derived from the seeds of Africa's majestic baobab tree. Revered across centuries from its deeply nourishing and healing qualities. This oil contains the blossom scent of Lavender Essential Oil.

fields.name: Grapefruit Oil
fields.description: Immerse yourself in the purity of nature with our Baobab Seed Oil, a divine naturally sourced oil extracted from the seeds of Africa's venerable baobab tree. Celebrated through time for its profound nourishing and rejuvenating properties, this sublime oil is enriched with many vitamins and minerals to keep your body and hair constantly feeling exceptional. This oil contains Grapefuit essential oil.

fields.name: Coconut Oil
fields.description: Experience the versatility and benefits of our Pure Coconut Oil, a staple for holistic beauty and wellness. Extracted from its finest coconuts, this multipurpose oil is rich in nourishing fatty acids and oxidants, offering a multitude of uses for both skin and hair care routines - plus cooking. This product was sourced from the main suppliers in Ghana.

fields.name: Honey
fields.description: Experience the natural sweetness and purity of our Pure Honey, a timeless treasure harvested from the finest hives. Locally sourced straight from the suppliers this honey has the richest and sweetest of tastes.

fields.name: Bundle 1
fields.description: Enjoy our Body Butter and Hair Butter bundle set for a discounted price.

fields.name: Bundle 2
fields.description: Enjoy our Hair Butter and Baobab Seed Oil bundle set at a discounted price.

fields.name: Bundle 3
fields.description: Enjoy our Hair Butter and Herbal Shampoo bundle set at a discounted price.

fields.name: Bundle 4
fields.description: Enjoy our Body Butter, Hair Butter and Baobab Seed Oil bundle set at a discounted price.

fields.name: Bundle 5
fields.description: Enjoy our set of all 4 skincare and haircare products bundle at a discounted price.
